title: Platinum Grit Volume 1
description: In Platinum Grit Chapters #1-5, the fearless Nils and the timid-but-still-surprisingly-together Jeremy take on the Zodiac (they won); Jer's insane Scottish relatives (they sort of win); a 1940s private dick (they draw when poor light stops play); and two sets of alien matchmakers (they...almost).
author: Trudy Cooper
